nodes.text: Kro Var was a barren planet that was located in the Unknown Regions.

During the New Sith Wars, a ship filled with refugees that were fleeing the Ruusan campaign came out of hyperspace at the wrong co-ordinates and crashed on Kro Var. The survivors organized themselves into clans and fought amongst themselves for the planet's limited resources. Eventually, an organization of Force-sensitives, the Shapers of Kro Var, developed from among the clans and they played a key role in the inter-clan conflicts.
Kro Var was eventually discovered by the Galactic Republic many years later. The Jedi Order attempted to help the planet's population reintegrate into galactic society.
